attributes.action: stop using the abbreviation UK (United Kingdom) and start using GB (Great Britain) again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last few years the term UK has become more and more used in public life, this is as we know a shortened version of 'The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern ireland.

With the government support of devolution etc, this is surely an ill choice of terminology.

We are a Great country, let's be known as Great Britain once more.
